dependencies.description:
This is the Cyrus SASL API implementation. It can be used on the client
or server side to provide authentication and authorization services.
dependencies.name: cyrus-sasl

dependencies.description:
OpenLDAP Software is an open source implementation of the Lightweight
Directory Access Protocol. The suite includes: slapd - stand-alone LDAP
daemon (server) libraries implementing the LDAP protocol, and utilities,
tools, and sample clients.
dependencies.name: openldap

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Pure-Python implementation of ASN.1 types and DER/BER/CER codecs
(X.208).
dependencies.name: py-pyasn1

dependencies.description:
A collection of ASN.1 modules expressed in form of pyasn1 classes.
Includes protocols PDUs definition (SNMP, LDAP etc.) and various data
structures (X.509, PKCS etc.).
dependencies.name: py-pyasn1-modules

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
python-ldap provides an object-oriented API to access LDAP directory
servers from Python programs.
name: py-python-ldap

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
